Detailed Description

Class used for integration of DBusTL with Glib toolkit.

Refer to Connection class documentation to see how this class is to be used in conjunction with DBUS connections.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

dbustl::GlibEventLoopIntegration::GlibEventLoopIntegration ( GMainContext *  ctxt = 0  ) 

Constructor that binds the created object with a given GMainContext.

All signals and methods callbacks for the eventual DBUS connection that will be associated with this object will be processed in this GMainContext.

Parameters:
ctxt the GMainContext to bind with. If null the default GMainContext is used

dbustl::GlibEventLoopIntegration::~GlibEventLoopIntegration (  )  [virtual]

Virtual destructor.
